description: This Java source file defines the User entity class for the backend application, representing platform users with their attributes, relationships, and standard getter/setter methods.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Entity class representing a platform user with properties, relationships, and accessor methods.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the user.

methods.name: getPasswordHash
methods.description: Returns the hashed password of the user.

methods.name: setPasswordHash
methods.description: Sets the hashed password of the user.

methods.name: getDisplayName
methods.description: Returns the display name of the user.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Checks if the user account is active.

methods.name: setActive
methods.description: Sets the active status of the user account.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the user.

methods.name: getApiKeys
methods.description: Returns the set of associated ApiKey objects.
